author: Natan
title: Eritrean immigrant beaten to death in Israel
text: Africa Eritrean immigrant beaten to death in Israel This is a political forum that is non-biased/non-partisan and treats every persons position on topics equally. This debate forum is not aligned to any political party. In today's politics , many ideas are split between and even within all the political parties. Often we find ourselves agreeing on one platform but some topics break our mold. We are here to discuss them in a civil political debate. If this is your first visit to our political forums, be sure to check out the FAQ and RULES . Registering for debate politics is necessary before posting. Register today to participate and remove the ads - it's free! Results 1 to 7 of 7 10th circle of hell (Belgium) Last Seen Apparently "mistaken" for terrorist. In Europe, many "refugees" are from Eritrea. While the country of Eritrea does have an appalling human rights record, most are economic migrants and do not seem to be popular, either in Europe or Israel. Last edited by Natan; Today at 05:14 AM . Want Hillary gone? Don't focus on Benghazi or some email server, go for the kill with Hillary at Ferguson: #AllLivesMatter My own blogs: Say hello to 1984 and Rachebel Today, 05:33 AM #2 10th circle of hell (Belgium) Last Seen Re: Eritrean immigrant beaten to death in Israel Eritreans are officially the third largest nationality among those crossing the Mediterranean into Europe. My own blogs: Say hello to 1984 and Rachebel Today, 05:56 AM #3 2,151 Re: Eritrean immigrant beaten to death in Israel It's not really clear what point you're trying to make or exactly what you're seeking to discuss. Threads die without any kind of focus. Today, 06:03 AM #4 10th circle of hell (Belgium) Last Seen 916 Re: Eritrean immigrant beaten to death in Israel No point, just bringing a news story that's currently headlining on CNN. It involves an Eritrean immigrant and Israel. Due to circumstances, I can't post it in the forum on Israel. Since it's relevant to Eritrea as well, decided to post it here. Want Hillary gone? Don't focus on Benghazi or some email server, go for the kill with Hillary at Ferguson: #AllLivesMatter My own blogs: Say hello to 1984 and Rachebel Today, 06:13 AM #5 Re: Eritrean immigrant beaten to death in Israel Did anyone else not know what the **** Eritrea was until this thread? Either way, he's right, a thread with no focus is kind of hard to debate.
